programme.desc: A young woman rethinks her life's direction after bumping into an old friend, leading her on a journey of self-discovery and change.

programme.title: My Puhunan: Kaya Mo
programme.desc: Entrepreneurs share inspiring stories of how they started their businesses and overcame challenges. Learn valuable tips and get motivated to start your own journey.

programme.title: Ano Na Bev?
programme.desc: A young woman navigates the challenges of adulthood in a bustling city, facing unexpected twists and forming new relationships along the way.

programme.title: TV Patrol Linggo
programme.desc: Catch the latest news, current events, and in-depth reports. Stay informed with comprehensive coverage and updates on issues that matter most.

programme.title: Citizen Pinoy
programme.desc: Citizen Pinoy airs every Sunday on The Filipino Channel. It is hosted by immigration attorney Michael J. Gurfinkel and Filipino TV personality Gel Santos-Relos. The program specializes in helping the Filipino community deal with immigration problems from here in North America all the way back to the Philippines. The show has featured many people who have dealt with problems in becoming an American

programme.title: Rainbow Rumble
programme.desc: A magical land is in trouble when a dark force threatens to steal all the colors. Brave heroes must band together to save their world from turning gray forever.

programme.desc: A journalist hosts a news magazine and lifestyle show, sharing compelling stories from various backgrounds and interests. Discover inspiring tales and insightful features.

programme.title: Home Away from Home

programme.title: Beached
programme.desc: A travel magazine that showcases the best beaches in the Philippines and shares information about where to stay.

programme.title: Can't Buy Me Love
programme.desc: The third daughter, Princess Chiu Yeung, of the Tang Emperor, is known throughout the kingdom for her beauty, but she is also known for her unreasonable and stubborn personality. For this reason, no one wants to marry her - that is, until the second son of the formerly wealthy Kam family, Kam Dor Luk, is persuaded to marry her to save the family business.

programme.title: Gising Pilipinas!
programme.desc: News bulletin featuring the latest news and developments.

programme.title: Kabayan
programme.desc: News bulletin featuring the latest news and developments.

programme.desc: Catch up on the latest news and stories from around the world with this live broadcast. Stay informed with reports on current events, weather, sports, and more.

programme.desc: Youngsters dive into a world of fun and adventure with exciting games, creative activities, and educational segments that spark curiosity and imagination.

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 4
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.desc:

programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Sing Galing Season 3 Ep 29 (Semifinals)
programme.desc: Sing Galing is a Philippine videoke singing reality game show. The contestants must know the right lyrics to any randomly chosen song, be it Filipino or foreign, without going out of tune. programme.desc: New Season, new masked singers, exciting twists and triple the fun on the third season of Masked Singer Pilipinas.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Maria Makiling ep 4
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 6
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 2
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. programme.title: Barrio Kulimlim ep 1

programme.title: 24 Oras
programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Beauty Empire
programme.desc: is a glossy drama series about a rags-to-riches beauty entrepreneur who is out to take revenge on the people who have wronged her. She comes out as a new beauty industry player, tearing down the empire that her enemies have built. She goes head-to-head against a crass but social media famous beauty CEO who is mentored by her idol, a powerful industry veteran whose ties to her goes beyond business.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: My Father's Wife
programme.desc: Two friends, Gina and Betsy, strike a deal: Gina will enter into a marriage of convenience with Betsy's boyfriend, Gerald, to help Betsy achieve her American dream. But when Gina and Gerald unexpectedly fall in love and choose to honor their vows, everything changes. Betrayed and furious, Betsy retaliates in the most shocking way-by marrying Gina's father. What begins as a calculated plan spirals

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally “kills” Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.
